casebody.data:
Margo And Daniel POLETT, Respondents
v.
PUBLIC COMMUNICATIONS, INC., Zimmer, Inc., Zimmer USA, Inc. and Zimmer Holdings, Inc., Petitioners No. 120 EAL 2018 Supreme Court of Pennsylvania. August 28, 2018

ORDER

PER CURIAM .

AND NOW, this 28th day of August, 2018, the Petition for Allowance of Appeal is DENIED.

Justice Wecht did not participate in the consideration or decision of this matter.
